title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bruce Feiler & Maximo Alvarez | 7/17/20
description:
Glenn has few new “positive” predictions for the future of America and whether ending up in Nazi gulags or witnessing Jesus coming back is more likely. Bruce Feiler, author of “Life Is in the Transitions,” joins to discuss how we all can get through “lifequakes” and come out better in the end. Cuban immigrant Maximo Alvarez warns that the rise of Marxism in America is playing out exactly as it did for Fidel Castro.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
